title: Track fault causing slower speeds on NSL

title_translations.zh-Hans: 轨道故障导致南北线（NSL）速度减慢
title_translations.ms: Ralat trek menyebabkan kelajuan perlahan di NSL
title_translations.ta: NSL இல் மெதுவான வேகத்திற்கு காரணமான தடப் பிழை

updates.text: NSL Update: Trains will travel slower from Somerset to Orchard NB. SMRT engineers can only rectify the fault after passenger service hours.
[NSL]UPDATE: Due to earlier track fault, trains will be travelling at a slower speed from Somerset towards Orchard.
[NSL]UPDATE: Due to earlier track fault, trains will be travelling at a slower speed from MarinaBay towards Orchard.
[NSL]UPDATE: Due to earlier track fault, trains will be travelling at a slower speed from #MarinaBay towards #Orchard.
[NSL]UPDATE: Due to earlier track fault, trains are still travelling at a slower speed from MarinaBay towards Orchard.
[NSL]UPDATE: Due to earlier track fault, trains are still travelling at a slower speed from #MarinaBay towards #Orchard.
[NSL]UPDATE:Estimate 10 mins additional travel time from #MarinaBay towards #AngMoKio due to track fault.  Our staff are recovering service.
[NSL]UPDATE: Track fault believed to be caused by a rail crack. Trains safe for service but travelling at slower speed as safety precaution.
[NSL]Only Northbound stretch btwn #Somerset & #Orchard is affected. Estimated additional 10 mins travel time from #MarinaBay towards #AMK.
[NSL]UPDATE:Estimate 10 mins additional travel time from #MarinaBay towards #AngMoKio due to track fault. Our staff are recovering service.
[NSL]UPDATE: SMRT engineers are at affected track investigating the cause. They will rectify the fault after passenger service hours.
[NSL]UPDATE: Track fault on northbound btwn Somerset & Orchard. Trains are travelling slower over the affected track as a safety precaution.
[NSL]UPDATE:Estimate 10 mins additional travel time from #MarinaBay towards #AngMoKio due to track fault.Our staff are recovering service.
[NSL]:Estimate 10 mins additional travelling time from #MarinaBay to #AngMoKio towards JurongEast due to track fault.
